name: Alex Supran
comment: I have had Walton forever. They are very sturdy and you can trust them. My kids dropped them several times and they keep working. For college students they are a plus because come in many different formats. Very good job Walton. You have here a well satisfied customer. Thanks.

name: Anisa Islam
comment: Bought many computers over the years, but Walton stands out for quality and longevity. Soon I will buy their another laptop, but will wait for the Black Monday discount. All other computers I bought had problems, but walton is a solid bet.

name: Alexander Hipp
comment: This has been a very good laptop. Good battery life, and great features. I would buy one again. I went from a desktop computer to this laptop, and never looked back. this is a laptop with many features that most computers do not have.

name: Julian Wan
comment: Only used Dell laptops for over 5 years and only two of them. Reliable and only used customer service a few times...getting to be too expensive to buy, though. Would be my next choice whenever I need a new one.
